PLSCF module¶

Written by Volkmar Zabel 2016

class PLSCF.PLSCF(prep_data)[source]¶

Bases: object

Exp_Win(x, fin_val)[source]¶

Applies an exponential window function to a signal x. The exponential window function is composed as: win[ii]=exp(a * ii) with a = (ln(f) / (n-1)) where n = length of x

return: windowed signal x_win

build_half_spectra(begin_frequency, end_frequency, nperseg, multiprocess=True)[source]¶

Builds a 3D tensor with cross spectral densities: Dimensions: number_of_all_channels x number_of_references x number_of_freq_lines

static remove_conjugates_new(vectors, values)[source]¶

removes conjugates and marks the vectors which appear in pairs

vectors.shape = [order+1, order+1] values.shape = [order+1,1]
